programs.name: Sewing Class

highlights.label: Hands-On Learning
highlights.description: Use real tools and materials from day one to practice sewing techniques.

highlights.label: Small Group
highlights.description: Personal attention and relaxed pace in a small class environment (8 students).

highlights.label: Comprehensive Training
highlights.description: Learn everything from taking measurements to constructing full garments.

programs.description: Fitright classes will teach you a variety of techniques to create clothing for yourself and family members, or to sew for profit. This comprehensive program covers everything from basic measurements to pattern making, fabric handling, and garment construction.

items.title: How to take measurements
items.blurb: Learn the proper techniques for taking accurate body measurements for garment fitting.

items.title: How to draft a Bodice (Front and Back)
items.blurb: Master the art of drafting bodice patterns for proper fit and style.

items.title: How to draft a skirt
items.blurb: Create skirt patterns from measurements with proper fit and design.

items.title: Pattern Making
items.blurb: Learn to create patterns from scratch and adapt existing patterns to your needs.

items.title: Pattern Grading
items.blurb: Understand how to adjust patterns for different sizes and proportions.

items.title: Laying and cutting of fabric
items.blurb: Master proper fabric layout and cutting techniques for efficient use of material.

items.title: Understanding fabric grain
items.blurb: Learn to identify and work with fabric grain for proper garment drape and fit.

items.title: Types of fabric and how to handle them during the sewing process
items.blurb: Understand different fabric types and their specific handling requirements.

items.title: Types of seams, pockets, and finishing techniques
items.blurb: Master various seam types, pocket construction, and professional finishing methods.

items.title: Use of sewing equipment and more
items.blurb: Learn to properly use and maintain sewing machines and other essential equipment.
